alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 2:36AM CST until January 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of one to three inches. * WHERE...The western Oklahoma Panhandle, western Texas Panhandle, and the southern three quarters of the Texas Panhandle. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Oklahoma, call 844-465-4997 for road information. In Texas, call 800-452-9292 for road information. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
